name: Camera Spy
description:
Story

You are Agent C. A highly decorated spy, trained in the art of espionage. Headquarters has sent you on a mission to gather intelligence on the activities of ECorp. You are to infiltrate the enemy stronghold and use your camera to record the activities of the guards and scientists. They're up to something and it's your job to find out what that is! Good luck!

Gameplay

Camera Spy is a stealth action game, where you'll have to avoid enemy contact and use the objects in your environment to your advantage. Scout around the area to find weapons and other objects to kill or distract the guards.

Once you've managed to get inside the castle walls, you'll have to find your way through the locked doors of the castle keep! Use your wits and tactical insight to avoid detection or amass enough weaponry to shoot your way through the enemy guards.

Credits

Massive thanks to sdelaplain and Ezekiel_III for their voice acting skills, Vision Is Augmented (a.k.a. Drengen) for his musical talents, popup for the handler image and to Kenney for providing many of the 3D models you'll see in this game.

I hope you enjoy playing Camera Spy and if you have any feedback for me or if you've found a bug or glitch, feel free to leave a comment!
